creator: pmh1wheel@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 34469
Patch to reset URL length each time around the loop

Although it's not HTTP compliant, there is code in apache to handle reverse mapping of relative redirects, and it has a bug which affects any subsequent ProxyPassRedirect statements, whether they are relative or absolute. The adjustment to the URL being tested is reset each time around the loop, but the adjustment of its length isn't, so the length check will potentially fail for mappings configured after the relative mapping.
